content.query:
create  table metatable(keycolumn VARCHAR(20),sourcedb varchar(20),sourcetable varchar(20),destdb varchar(20),desttable varchar(20),changed varchar(20) NULL, batchstarttime DATETIME  NULL, batchendtime DATETIME  NULL)

insert into metatable(keycolumn,sourcedb,sourcetable,destdb,desttable) values('cusid','dbo','customer','ded_pool','customer')
insert into metatable(keycolumn,sourcedb,sourcetable,destdb,desttable) values('prodid','dbo','product','ded_pool','product')
insert into metatable(keycolumn,sourcedb,sourcetable,destdb,desttable) values('vendid','dbo','vendor','ded_pool','vendor')
insert into metatable(keycolumn,sourcedb,sourcetable,destdb,desttable) values('tranid','dbo','transactions','ded_pool','transactions')

create table audit_log_table(sur_id int IDENTITY,sourcedb varchar(20),sourcetable varchar(20),destdb varchar(20),desttable varchar(20),rowcounts int,pipelinestarttime DATETIME,pipelineendtime DATETIME,pipelinestatus VARCHAR(20))

select * from audit_log_table
select batchstarttime from metatable

create table customer(cusid int,cusname VARCHAR(20),inserteddate NVARCHAR(30))
create table product(prodid int,prodname VARCHAR(20),inserteddate NVARCHAR(30))
create table vendor(vendid int,vendname VARCHAR(20),inserteddate NVARCHAR(30))
create table transactions(tranid int,amount DECIMAL(10,2),inserteddate NVARCHAR(30))

drop TABLE empl

select * from product
select * from customer

truncate table product
truncate table customer
truncate table vendor

drop table product
drop table customer
drop table vendor
drop table transactions

create table metatable1(keycolumn VARCHAR(20),sourcedb varchar(20),sourcetable varchar(20),destdb varchar(20),desttable varchar(20),dependenttable varchar(40) NULL,dependencylevel int NULL)

insert into metatable1 values('cusid','dbo','customer','ded_pool','customer',NULL,1)
insert into metatable1 values('prodid','dbo','product','ded_pool','product',NULL,1)
insert into metatable1 values('vendid','dbo','vendor','ded_pool','vendor',NULL,1)
insert into metatable1 values('tranid','dbo','transactions','ded_pool','transactions','customer,product',1)
